Assessment.QuestionText: Can you write the code to display a color dialog box with the format shown in the image?
Assessment.CorrectAnswer:
ColorDialog cdlgColor = new ColorDialog();
cdlgColor.AllowFullOpen = true;
cdlgColor.FullOpen = true;
cdlgColor.Color = Color.Black;
cdlgColor.ShowHelp = false;
cdlgColor.ShowDialog();
